{{infobox military conflict |conflict =Battle of Neukalen |partof =the [[Pomeranian War]] ([[Seven Years' War]]) |image = |caption = |date =2 January 1762 |place =[[Neukalen]], [[Germany]] |coordinates = |map_type = |map_relief = |latitude = |longitude = |map_size = |map_marksize = |map_caption = |map_label = |territory = |result =Swedish victory |status = |combatant1 ={{flag|Sweden|23px}} |combatant2 ={{flag|Prussia|1750|23px}} |commander1 ={{flagicon|Sweden|23px}} [[Carl Constantin De Carnall]] |commander2 ={{flagicon|Prussia|1750|23px}} [[Wilhelm Sebastian von Belling]] |units1 = |units2 = |strength1 =3,000–3,400:
8 [[battalion]]s,
200 [[cavalry]] |strength2 =2,000:[http://www.stadt-neukalen.de/texte/seite.php?id=122721 History of Neukalen]
3–5 [[battalion]]s,
10 [[Squadron (army)|squadron]]s |casualties1 =174:Flykten från Berlin, Gunnar W Bergman. C. 34. 37 killed,
137 wounded |casualties2 =350:
50 killed,
120 wounded,
180 captured |notes = }} {{Campaignbox Seven Years' War: European}} {{Campaignbox Pomeranian War (1757–1762)}} The '''Battle of Neukalen''' was a battle at [[Neukalen]] of the [[Seven Years' War]] between Swedish and Prussian forces fought on January 2, 1762. The Swedish force under the command of [[Carl Constantin De Carnall]] managed to rout the [[Prussian]] forces camping on a hill next to the town of [[Malchin]]. This was the last battle of the Swedish and Prussian troops during the war.[http://www.kronoskaf.com/syw/index.php?title=1762-01-02-_Combat_of_Neu_Kalen 1762-01-02- Combat of Neu Kalen, Kronoskaf] ==Notes== {{reflist|2}} *[https://books.google.com/books?id=-oZBAAAAcAAJ&pg=PA152&dq=%22Neu+Kahlen%22+1762&hl=sv&sa=X&ei=twiYULixKOuX0QW30oGwCw&redir_esc=y#v=onepage&q=%22Neu%20Kahlen%22%201762&f=false Försök till en Historia öfver det förra Pommerska Kriget: 1757 - 1762, Gustaf von Schantz] {{Battle-stub}} {{coord missing|Mecklenburg-Vorpommern}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Neukalen}} [[Category:Battles of the Seven Years' War]] [[Category:Conflicts in 1762]] [[Category:1762 in Germany]] [[Category:Battles involving Sweden]] [[Category:Battles involving Prussia]]
